channel.title: Looking for 1 Experienced player//UTC/GMT +1 hour
channel.description:
Hello my name is lee i am looking for a very experienced player On minecraft. you must knows how to get around very well the server "rules will be no flying"spawning" unless given permission" You would need a microphone and The server will be Aiming around 10-14 hours a-day running in UTC/GMT +1 hour Post a comment if u wanna join I wont pick anyone for this job the project will be a big one And will take a very long time to complete thanks for reading and good luck
once selected you will be given the ip to connect

item.title: Looking for 1 Experienced player//UTC/GMT +1 hour
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Hello, I have the Minecraft Explorer app on my iPod Touch which gives me instant access to a wide range of useful information.

I have experience operating a number of Minecraft servers running on Mac OSX Servers, which provide high performance and upgradability.

I have FaceTime and iChat on my iMac running Mac OS X 10.6.8.

I live in England, the home of GMT. We are currently in BST so it is GMT+1 here.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for 1 Experienced player//UTC/GMT +1 hour
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

Hello, i know every recipe out of my head and i play minecraft since beta 1.1_02.
I have been op on 2 servers already and mod in 1.
I have skype and i could host a ventrillo or teamspeak server if you wish.
I live in Belgium so my time is also GMT +1.

Read full topic
